# `lex`

Lex tokens out of a string input that represents some JSDoc-embedded
text.

| name | description |
| ---- | ----------- |
| `text` | input text. |

## Examples

```js
var result = lex('See {@link MyClass}.');
// returns
result = [
  {
    "type": "text",
    "capture": [
      " See "
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "link",
    "capture": [
      "{@link MyClass}",
      "MyClass"
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "text",
    "capture": [
      ".\n"
    ]
  }
];
```

Returns  array of lexed tokens.
